facebook graph API - nearby¶

graph api endpoint¶

GET hhttps://graph.facebook.com¶

applies to all method below

nearby search¶

GET /v2.2/search?limit=5000&offset=0&type=place&center={LAT},{LNG}&distance={DISTANCE_IN_METERS}&access_token={FB_OAUTH_TOKEN}¶

The FB_OAUTH_TOKEN should be obtain on baceknd using app-id and app-secret.

returns:

{
  "data": [
